changeSet.createView: SELECT w.name AS workspace, wa.key AS wsp_key, wa.description AS wsp_desc, bl.id, b.name AS product, rel.name AS relationship, l.name AS child, bl.notes, up.name AS updated_by, bl.version FROM product_relationship bl JOIN product b ON bl.product = b.id JOIN relationship rel ON bl.relationship = rel.id JOIN relationship l ON bl.child = l.id JOIN agency up ON bl.updated_by = up.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.workspace_authorization wa ON bl.workspace = wa.id LEFT JOIN ruleform.product w ON wa.defining_product = w.id
